Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin March 18, 2005 Two Good Resources - Info Architecture & Web Design Design The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Fellow UW graduate, Heidi Adkinson runs two very relevant websites on the subject of her Master's thesis - e-commerce research. The sites both offer some very good information on the subject of web design and web architecture, particularly in the area of e-commerce sites.The work that Heidi has done can be valuable to anyone running a commerce based site. She has some good research papers and draws interesting, if not completely startling conclusions on the subject. Her sites are both exceptional usable and offer great images and diagrams to accompany her explanations.Check out: Web Design Practices - Which contains a list of information on common design practices IA Think - On the subject of information architecture and content creation Copied! Back to Top
